content: Non-mathematical mindset engineer with more then five years teamwork experience in IT. My main inspiration is exploration of new technologies, which is meticulously studing avaliable data suorces and systematizing gained knowledge for better understanding. Now I am completly immersed in new work, trying my best to create accessible and easy-to-use documentation for big microservice application.
